bring about.from sentence: As shown in , multi-task RPN , Supervised Transformer , and feature combination will bring about 1 % , 1 % , and 2 % recall improvement respectively .

anyone part.from sentence: Besides , these three parts are complementary , remove anyone part will cause a recall drop .

Our non - top K suppression.from sentence: Our non - top K suppression is very close to using all candidates , and achieved consistently better results than NMS under the same number of candidates .

NMS.include: too much noisy low confidence candidates
NMS.from sentence: We found that NMS tend to include too much noisy low confidence candidates .
